title: 1137 49 "I'm Sorry, Dad - Bonney's Tears and Kuma's Fist"Transliteration: "Gomen ne, Otōsan - Bonī no Namida to Kuma no Koboshi" (Japanese:ごめんね、お父さん ボニーの涙とくまの拳) Wataru Matsumi Jin Tanaka Yong-Ce Tu & Ziwei He July 27, 2025(2025-07-27) 2.7%[51]
transformers_text: 1137 49 I'm Sorry Dad Bonne y's Tears and Kuma's Fist Transliteration Go men ne Ot san Bon no N amida to Kuma no Ko boshi Japanese Wataru Matsu mi J in Tanaka Yong Ce Tu Zi wei He July 27 2025 2025 07 27 2 7 51 After viewing Kuma's memories Bonne y reconciles with Vega punk who gives her a sapphire necklace meant for her 10 th birthday from Kuma Bonne y blames Saturn not Vega punk for Kuma's fate In the present Saturn coldly claims Kuma is dead while Bonne y tries to attack him with Distortion Future but fails Saturn reveals he gave Bonne y her Age Age Fruit powers through an experiment as a baby which weakens when her perception of the future falters He dismisses Nik a as a myth and admits to infecting Ginny with the Sapphire Scales which Bonne y inherited As Bonne y despairs Kuma arrives on Egghead and protects her from Saturn's attacks Shocked by Kuma's survival Saturn reveals he had activated Kuma's self destruct mechanism Kuma employs Armament Hak i and delivers a powerful punch to Saturn
